TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Thumb extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示可由使用者拖曳的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以包含在另一個控制項，例如或控制，可讓使用者變更控制項的值。The control can be included in another control, such as a or control, to let the user change the control's value. 也可用來調整控制項的大小。The can also be used to resize controls. 例如，視窗角的控制項可以提供使用者可以按一下以啟動調整大小作業滑鼠的位置。For example, a control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation. 提供，和事件，以管理拖曳滑鼠指標相關聯的作業。 provides , and events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer. 當使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕，控制項接收邏輯焦點與滑鼠擷取，而就會引發事件。When the user presses the left mouse button, the control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the event is raised. 雖然控制項有焦點與滑鼠擷取，事件可以多次發生無限制。While the control has focus and mouse capture, the event can be raised multiple times without limit. 當使用者放開滑鼠左的按鈕，控制項失去滑鼠捕捉和就會引發事件。When the user releases the left mouse button, the control loses mouse capture and the event is raised. 事件資訊提供集中位置，變更，但不是重新定位。The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the . 您必須手動變更或重新定位或其他您想要調整大小或變更在拖曳作業結果的項目。You must manually change or reposition the or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation. 控制項不提供拖放功能。The control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality. A控制項可以接收滑鼠擷取，但無法接收鍵盤焦點。A control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus. 因此，屬性對應到鍵盤焦點設定為`false`。Therefore, the property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`. 這個值會覆寫父類別，將此屬性設定為`true`。This value overrides the parent class that sets this property to `true`. 若要提供拖放到功能，提供類別處理，和事件。To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the , and events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱，和方法。For more information, see the , and methods. 當屬於中可檢視區域中，或檢視區的大小的內容捲動的控制項會反映在檢視區大小。When a is part of a control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the reflects the size of the viewport. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 下圖顯示控制項屬於控制項。The following illustration shows a control that is part of a control. ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "捲軸圖例")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## 自訂 Thumb 控制項Customizing the Thumb Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[Thumb Syles 和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelDrag() cil managed

span.span: Cancels a drag operation for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有滑鼠擷取，而且邏輯焦點，這個方法會移除滑鼠擷取，並引發事件。If a has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragCompleted As DragCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 當 控制項遺失滑鼠捕捉時就會出現。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這事件發生於放開滑鼠左的按鈕時，或是當方法呼叫。This event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the method is called. 控制項收到滑鼠捕捉時使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕時將滑鼠指標暫停控制項。The control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 目的滑鼠位置時發生的事件由提供的最後事件。The position of the mouse when the event occurs is provided by the of the last event. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指派的事件處理常式事件控制項，以及如何定義事件處理常式。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 如需完整範例，請參閱[捲動方塊的拖曳功能範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#dragcompletedhandler)] [!code-vb[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#dragcompletedhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent DragCompletedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly DragCompletedEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragDelta As DragDeltaEventHandler

summary.span: 當 控制項具有邏輯焦點和滑鼠捕捉時，會在滑鼠變更位置時出現一次或多次。

span.span: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a control has logical focus and mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項接收焦點與滑鼠擷取，當使用者按滑鼠左鍵時將滑鼠指標暫停控制項。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 控制項失去滑鼠擷取，當使用者放開滑鼠左的按鈕，或方法呼叫。The control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the method is called. 新就會發生事件每次在螢幕移動滑鼠位置。A new event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen. 因此，這可能會引發事件多次無限制時控制項具有滑鼠擷取。Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a control has mouse capture. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指派的事件處理常式事件控制項，以及如何定義事件處理常式。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 如需完整範例，請參閱[捲動方塊的拖曳功能範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)]

summary.span: 當 控制項收到邏輯焦點和滑鼠捕捉時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a control receives logical focus and mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項接收焦點與滑鼠擷取，當使用者按滑鼠左鍵時將滑鼠指標暫停。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指派的事件處理常式事件控制項，以及如何定義事件處理常式。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 如需完整範例，請參閱[捲動方塊的拖曳功能範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#DragStartedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#dragstartedhandler)] [!code-vb[Thumb#DragStartedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#dragstartedhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsDragging { get; protected set; }

summary.span: 取得值，指出 控制項是否具有邏輯焦點和滑鼠捕捉，以及是否已按下左滑鼠按鈕。

span.span: Gets whether the control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.

value.span: 如果 控制項具有焦點和滑鼠捕捉，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性值變更方法呼叫。When the property changes its value, the method is called. 從.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，受保護的 setter。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設.NET Framework 3.5 版。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 提供 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會處理藉由設定事件至`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，這個方法可讓邏輯焦點與滑鼠擷取和設定屬性`true`。Also, this method gives the logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the property to `true`. 這項實作也會引發事件。This implementation also raises the event.

Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會處理藉由設定事件至`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，這個方法會移除從滑鼠捕捉，並設定屬性`false`。Also, this method removes mouse capture from the , and sets the property to `false`. 這項實作也會引發事件。This implementation also raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseMove (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有邏輯焦點與滑鼠擷取，此實作會引發時滑鼠移動事件。If the has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the event when the mouse moves. 在此案例中，事件由設定至`true`。In this scenario, the event is handled by setting to `true`.
